Name: How the Ear Works: Lesson for Kids - Parts & Facts
Subject: ['art and entertainment', 'music', 'music genres', 'pets', 'music reference', 'dogs', 'world music']
Description: Ears help us collect and process sounds. In this lesson, you will learn about the three sections of the ear, different parts of the ear, and how these parts help you to hear all of the sounds around you.
